title: How to request an ORAP hearing for my judgment debtor. I filled out the forms brought them to the court but they said i
question: needed to get a date first and to consult an attorney. Are there steps listed somewhere that show me how to do this correctly? Thank you!
answers: The rules vary by county, so you will need to consult the local rules in your county or talk to a local attorney. In San Diego, I would submit the completed form and fees and the court would choose the date. Procedures must be different near you.
